mapper.select: SELECT ZDMC,HLMC,SSJD,PH,NVL("DO", 0)"DO",CODMN,NVL(COD, 0) COD, NVL(NH3N, 0)NH3N,NVL(TP, 0)TP,NVL(TN, 0)TN,NVL(ZYJT, 0)ZYJT,NVL(HFF, 0)HFF,SZLB,JCSJ FROM U_HJZL_XC.T_SJZX_SHJ_ZDJC_HOUR WHERE XH = #{XH}

SELECT ZAD_DATA1 PH,ZAD_DATA5 COD,ZAD_DATA32 NH3N,ZAD_DATA36 TP,ZAD_DATA34 TN,ZAD_DATA19 ZT,to_char(TSTAMP,'yyyy-MM-dd') "DAY",to_char(TSTAMP,'HH24') "HOUR" FROM U_ZXJK_XC.T_FS_INFECTANT_HOUR WHERE TO_CHAR(TSTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD')=#{DATE} AND PORTID=#{XH} ORDER BY TSTAMP ASC

SELECT NVL(ZAD_DATA7,0) SO2, NVL(ZAD_DATA14,0) YC,NVL(ZAD_DATA4,0) CO,NVL(ZAD_DATA5,0) HCL,NVL(ZAD_DATA21,0) NOW, TO_CHAR(TSTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') "DAY",TO_CHAR(TSTAMP,'HH24') "HOUR" FROM U_ZXJK_XC.T_FQ_INFECTANTBY60 WHERE TO_CHAR(TSTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD')=#{DATE} AND PORTID=#{XH} ORDER BY TSTAMP ASC

SELECT NVL(ZAD_DATA7,0) SO2, NVL(ZAD_DATA14,0) YC,NVL(ZAD_DATA4,0) CO,NVL(ZAD_DATA5,0) HCL,NVL(ZAD_DATA21,0) NOW, TO_CHAR(TSTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') "DAY",TO_CHAR(TSTAMP,'HH24') "HOUR" FROM U_ZXJK_XC.T_FQ_INFECTANTBY60 WHERE TSTAMP>=to_date(#{STARTDATE},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TSTAMP<=to_date(#{ENDDATE},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND PORTID=#{XH} ORDER BY TSTAMP ASC

SELECT ZAD_DATA1 PH,ZAD_DATA5 COD,ZAD_DATA32 NH3N,ZAD_DATA36 TP,ZAD_DATA34 TN,ZAD_DATA19 ZT,to_char(TSTAMP,'yyyy-MM-dd') "DAY",to_char(TSTAMP,'HH24') "HOUR" FROM U_ZXJK_XC.T_FS_INFECTANT_HOUR WHERE TSTAMP>=to_date(#{STARTDATE},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TSTAMP<=to_date(#{ENDDATE},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND PORTID=#{XH} ORDER BY TSTAMP ASC
